page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE IN CONNEL
page.content: I rise at 0745.After dressing I have my breakfast,clean my teeth and wash my face.My Dad is a Clerk of Works with Strathclyde Regional Council.My oldest sister works in Oban,my middle sister works in Glasgow and my youngest sister works at the stables. My Dad goes out first.I leave for school at 0830.I have a school lunch at 1230 and it costs me 58p.I get out of school at 1530.I then go out on my BMX Turbo.I have my tea at 1730.I then get ready for Boys Brigade which is in Oban at 1900.There we play games and march.When I get home I watch a wee bit of television.I go to bed at 2115.
